metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: Security Analyst III
content:
Our Opportunity:
Chewy is seeking a Security Analyst III to join an established technology team in Plantation FL. At Chewy, it is our mission to be the most trusted and convenient destination for pet parents (and partners) everywhere. We have evolved into an innovative Fortune 500 industry leader. The Information Security team’s core objective is to relentlessly protect the digital identities of Chewy’s pet parents, team members, and business partners; ensuring confidentiality, availability and integrity of all data entrusted to us. The expectations of the prospective candidate will be to manage the lifecycle for security investigations and incidents while supporting the development and maintenance of SIEM and SOAR platforms, including OSINT, detection engineering, and improving outcomes for security investigations. The ideal candidate will support Chewy Security Team’s initiatives. 
What You’ll Do:

Review and triage alerts generated by internal security tools.
Evaluate and improve signals generated from various internal sources with the goal of improving core SOC metrics.
Leverage all relevant data sources to gather open-source intelligence (OSINT) to enrich the incident management lifecycle products.
Document and implement process improvements across the security incident management lifecycle.
Prioritize post incident remediation tasks based on risk level, assign them to the relevant owner, and monitor progress until completion.
Apply root cause analysis to identify and assess problems and key drivers of success.
Draw potential conclusions from complex data sets about security investigations.
Participate in stakeholder meetings to discuss technical details of investigations.

What You’ll Need:

Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Information Systems, or similar; or equivalent experience.
Working knowledge of common technical controls across security domains (logical access, configuration management, security operations etc.).
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify, mitigate and communicate risks effectively to stakeholders.
Experience managing Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) and Security Orchestration, Automation and Response (SOAR) platforms.
Familiarity managing extended detection and response (XDR) platforms.
Deep knowledge of security incident response lifecycle and associated processes.
Ability to balance multiple priorities at a given time.
Must be team oriented and have a customer first mindset.

Bonus (if applicable):

Foundational knowledge of data analytics and visualization in SIEM or SOAR platforms.
Experience drafting timelines and preserving artifacts as part of security incident handling procedures.
Experience working in the e-commerce environment.
Experience triaging security incidents in public clouds (AWS, Azure, Google).
Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.

You may opt out of these messages at any time by replying 'STOP' to any text messages you receive.

Arbitration Agreement Signed?
Arbitration Agreement Signed Date

Deloitte is Chewy’s independent auditor. To not impair Deloitte's independence, Chewy must validate the role of any current or former Deloitte employee against any exempt role they are interviewing for at Chewy. Do you currently work for Deloitte or have you ever been employed by Deloitte in the past?

Close family ties to a Deloitte employee could also impair Deloitte’s independence as Chewy’s auditor should you become employed by Chewy.  Do you have a close family member (spouse or equivalent, parent, dependent, non-dependent child, and/or sibling) that currently works for Deloitte?
